definitions.text: an organization to gain political power
examples: in 1992 Perot tried to organize a third party at the national level

definitions.text: a group of people gathered together for pleasure
examples: she joined the party after dinner

definitions.text: a band of people associated temporarily in some activity
examples: they organized a party to search for food
the company of cooks walked into the kitchen

definitions.text: an occasion on which people can assemble for social interaction and entertainment
examples: he planned a party to celebrate Bastille Day

definitions.text: a person involved in legal proceedings
examples: the party of the first part

definitions.text: have or participate in a party
examples: The students were partying all night before the exam
